text:
Thank you to everybody who tuned in at 1pm today for our Facebook live Q&A about the #COVID19 #vaccine and #epilepsy with our Medical Director, Professor Ley Sander.

If you weren't able to make it, the Q&A video can be watched on Facebook here https://t.co/Bw19X2Sb9Y 💜 https://t.co/AHIvrASZDQ
